short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the definition of each guessed word in Wordle

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wordle is a really fun game, and sometimes you got yourself wondering what the word you just typed actually means. This extension will help you with that by displaying a brief definition of the word that was guessed.

Considerations:
- Currently only works with the official Wordle (https://www.nytimes.com/games/wordle/index.html)
- It uses dictionaryapi.dev to fetch the definitions
- This project is opensource, check https://github.com/fernand-o/wordle-dictionary
